text: (nabiye!) oba ovunta niyoga kalahot ovunda niyata vasayenma (yuddhayata) pitatva yana bavata allah mata sthirava divrannaha. oba (ovunta) mese pavasanu: “(mese) nodivranu. oba avanata vi katayutu kirima danna karunaki. niyata vasayenma allah oba karana dæya hondin danneku vasayenma sitinneya”
